summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 TOYOTA MATRIX. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V006000 (AIR BAGS) EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR REPAIR. THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION IN MARCH OF 2017. THE DEALER (FAULKNER TOYOTA TREVOSE 2425 LINCOLN HIGHWAY, TREVOSE, PA, 19053) STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE FOR REPAIR AND PARTS MAY BE AVAILABLE IN DECEMBER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.    UPDATED 08/31/17*LJ    *CN
